chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:

The product does not meet the condition 'Excellent'!
-Multiple noticeable usage marks around the entire device, visible even from more than 20cm away.
-Manipulations and damage to SIM card holder
-Dirt/dirt around camera/objective area
-Deep scratches on display
In no way is it in a state of 'Excellent'.
Please arrange for an exchange or return the ordered description-matching device or cancel the purchase agreement and refund the purchase price plus service charge.
Oliver Zydek
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Oliver, You'll find the return shipping label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a nearby return location. A list of return locations can be found here: Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here. 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective film or wrapping. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product positioned so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return shipping label on top of the box (you can also include a spare label inside in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take a photo of the package from both inside and out before sending it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transport. Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Return for refund.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Umit Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
